texts.biography: As a trusted servant of Agar, Codgur joined the army of Deyja with his master to create a new world. Great understanding of his kind was a main asset of this cold-blooded Minotaur.
texts.name: Codgur

specialty.description:
{Sky Brawlers and Sky Knights}

Increases Speed of any Sky Brawlers or Sky Knights by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 6 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Sky Brawlers
